```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load data}
presT = read.csv("dyn_Temp_pres_1990_2009_monthly_ExtractPtsAlaWai.csv" )
rcp45T = read.csv("dyn_Temp_rcp45_2080_2099_monthly_ExtractPtsAlaWai.csv")
rcp85T = read.csv("dyn_Temp_rcp85_2080_2099_monthly_ExtractPtsAlaWai.csv")
presRF = read.csv("dyn_RF_pres_1990_2009_monthly_ExtractPtsAlaWai.csv" )
rcp45RF = read.csv("dyn_RF_rcp45_2080_2099_monthly_ExtractPtsAlaWai.csv")
rcp85RF = read.csv("dyn_RF_rcp85_2080_2099_monthly_ExtractPtsAlaWai.csv")
```

```{r load libraries}
library(car)
```


```{r predict vvhA for "present day"}
pres = presT[,1:5]
pres$Temperature = presT$NOAA.USW00022521..HNL.
pres$Rainfall = presRF$NOAA.USC00516122..Manoa.
pres$log10vvhA = 0.4414*log(pres$Rainfall+1) + 0.1405*(pres$Temperature) - 3.7750
pres$vvhA = 10^pres$log10vvhA
```

```{r predict vvhA for RCP 4.5}
rcp45 = rcp45T[,1:5]
rcp45$Temperature = rcp45T$NOAA.USW00022521..HNL.
rcp45$Rainfall = rcp45RF$NOAA.USC00516122..Manoa.
rcp45$log10vvhA = 0.4414*log(rcp45$Rainfall+1) + 0.1405*(rcp45$Temperature) - 3.7750
rcp45$vvhA = 10^rcp45$log10vvhA
```

```{r predict vvhA for RCP 8.5}
rcp85 = rcp85T[,1:5]
rcp85$Temperature = rcp85T$NOAA.USW00022521..HNL.
rcp85$Rainfall = rcp85RF$NOAA.USC00516122..Manoa.
rcp85$log10vvhA = 0.4414*log(rcp85$Rainfall+1) + 0.1405*(rcp85$Temperature) - 3.7750
rcp85$vvhA = 10^rcp85$log10vvhA

```

```{r plot changes}
c = rbind(pres, rcp45, rcp85)
with(c, plot(log10vvhA ~ Time))
mod = lm(log10vvhA ~ Time, data=c)
Anova(mod)
TukeyHSD(aov(mod))
```
